xxl.core.collections.queues
Class Queues

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.queues.Queues

public abstract class Queues
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains various static methods for manipulating queues.

Method Summary
static
<E> void
enqueueAll(Queue<? super E> queue, E... objects)
          Invokes queue.enqueue(Object o) on all objects o from the array objects.
static

          Invokes queue.enqueue(Object o) on all objects o contained in the iterator.
static
<E> E[]
toArray(Queue<? extends E> queue, E[] array)
          Converts a queue to an object array.
static java.lang.Object[] toArray(Queue<java.lang.Object> queue)
          Converts a queue to an object array whose length is equal to the number of the queue's elements.

Method Detail

enqueueAll

public static <E> void enqueueAll(Queue<? super E> queue,
                                  java.util.Iterator<? extends E> iterator)
Invokes queue.enqueue(Object o) on all objects o contained in the iterator.

Type Parameters:
E - the type of the elements stored by the queue.
Parameters:
queue - the queue to insert the elements into.
iterator - iterator containing the elements to insert.

enqueueAll

public static <E> void enqueueAll(Queue<? super E> queue,
                                  E... objects)
Invokes queue.enqueue(Object o) on all objects o from the array objects.

Type Parameters:
E - the type of the elements stored by the queue.
Parameters:
queue - the queue to insert the elements into.
objects - array containing the elements to insert.

toArray

public static java.lang.Object[] toArray(Queue<java.lang.Object> queue)
Converts a queue to an object array whose length is equal to the number of the queue's elements.

Parameters:
queue - the input queue.
Returns:
an object array containing the queue's elements.

toArray

public static <E> E[] toArray(Queue<? extends E> queue,
                              E[] array)
Converts a queue to an object array. If the queue contains more elements than the array is able to store, the remaining elements stay into the queue.

Type Parameters:
E - the type of the elements stored by the queue.
Parameters:
queue - the input queue.
array - the array to be filled.
Returns:
the filled object array.
